actions.label: 󰕾  Vol
actions.command: sh -c '[[ $SWAYNC_TOGGLE_STATE == true ]] && wpctl set-mute @DEFAULT_AUDIO_SINK@ 0 || wpctl set-mute @DEFAULT_AUDIO_SINK@ 1'
actions.update-command: sh -c '[[ $(wpctl get-volume @DEFAULT_AUDIO_SINK@ | grep -c MUTED) -eq 0 ]] && echo true || echo false'

actions.label: 󰍬  Mic
actions.command: sh -c '[[ $SWAYNC_TOGGLE_STATE == true ]] && wpctl set-mute @DEFAULT_AUDIO_SOURCE@ 0 || wpctl set-mute @DEFAULT_AUDIO_SOURCE@ 1'
actions.update-command: sh -c '[[ $(wpctl get-volume @DEFAULT_AUDIO_SOURCE@ | grep -c MUTED) -eq 0 ]] && echo true || echo false'

actions.label: 󰖩  WiFi
actions.command: sh -c '[[ $SWAYNC_TOGGLE_STATE == true ]] && nmcli radio wifi on || nmcli radio wifi off'
actions.update-command: sh -c '[[ $(nmcli radio wifi) == "enabled" ]] && echo true || echo false'

actions.label: 󰂯  BT
actions.command: sh -c '[[ $SWAYNC_TOGGLE_STATE == true ]] && bluetoothctl power on || bluetoothctl power off'
actions.update-command: sh -c 'bluetoothctl show | grep -q "Powered: yes" && echo true || echo false'
